data.name: PRICE - Concept Design Works（设定集 Chinese）
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes a 64-page Game Setting Guide book of “PRICE”, which is comprised of the following contents:


1.Plot Analysis
2.Characters' setting
3.Items' setting
4.Production Group members’ reflections
5.Gallery

This e-book is written in simplified Chinese and its paper-format is out of print now.
About The DLC Content!
Community Announcements - Mayuri
Someone has bought the DLC pack, but they can't find the content!
We are very sorry for the unclear description!

All The DLC Content will be in the local Folder
By Property -> local Folder

There would be 2 more Folders!

PRICE - Concept Design Works
PRICE - Original Sound Track

All the content will be in it.

Thanks for your supporting for 《PRICE》!
